title: 正版启动器无法启动游戏
author: 黑茶RGO
txt_content:
三个月没碰自己家的电脑，结果再次想启动游戏时无法启动，求解决方法
下面是启动游戏时出现的信息：

Bootstrap (v5)
Current time is Jan 6, 2017 10:36:30 PM
System.getProperty('os.name') == 'Windows XP'
System.getProperty('os.version') == '5.1'
System.getProperty('os.arch') == 'x86'
System.getProperty('java.version') == '1.8.0_91'
System.getProperty('java.vendor') == 'Oracle Corporation'
System.getProperty('sun.arch.data.model') == '32'

Looking for update
Downloading: https://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecra ... /launcher.pack.lzma
Exception: java.net.UnknownHostException: s3.amazonaws.com
Downloading: https://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecra ... /launcher.pack.lzma (try 2/10)
Exception: java.net.UnknownHostException: s3.amazonaws.com
Downloading: https://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecra ... /launcher.pack.lzma (try 3/10)
Exception: java.net.UnknownHostException: s3.amazonaws.com
Downloading: https://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecra ... /launcher.pack.lzma (try 4/10)
Exception: java.net.UnknownHostException: s3.amazonaws.com
Downloading: https://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecra ... /launcher.pack.lzma (try 5/10)
Exception: java.net.UnknownHostException: s3.amazonaws.com
Downloading: https://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecra ... /launcher.pack.lzma (try 6/10)
Exception: java.net.UnknownHostException: s3.amazonaws.com
Downloading: https://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecra ... /launcher.pack.lzma (try 7/10)
Exception: java.net.UnknownHostException: s3.amazonaws.com
Downloading: https://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecra ... /launcher.pack.lzma (try 8/10)
Exception: java.net.UnknownHostException: s3.amazonaws.com
Downloading: https://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecra ... /launcher.pack.lzma (try 9/10)
Exception: java.net.UnknownHostException: s3.amazonaws.com
Downloading: https://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecra ... /launcher.pack.lzma (try 10/10)
Exception: java.net.UnknownHostException: s3.amazonaws.com
Unable to download remote file. Check your internet connection/proxy settings.
Didn't find an update in time.
Reversing LZMA on C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\Application Data\.minecraft\launcher.pack.lzma to C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\Application Data\.minecraft\launcher.pack
FATAL ERROR: net.minecraft.bootstrap.FatalBootstrapError: Unable to un-lzma: LZMA.LzmaException: LZMA : Data Error
        at net.minecraft.bootstrap.Bootstrap.unpack(Bootstrap.java:146)
        at net.minecraft.bootstrap.Bootstrap.execute(Bootstrap.java:123)
        at net.minecraft.bootstrap.Bootstrap.main(Bootstrap.java:381)


Please fix the error and restart.

replies.txt_content:

我选择帮你下
下好后放
C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\Application Data\.minecraft\launcher.pack
试试

replies.author: HDLONE
replies.txt_content: Unable to download remote file. Check your internet connection/proxy settings.一大堆看下来，我只懂得这一行是一个问题。。。它说你网络有问题，无法下载remote 文件，这个单词好几个意思= =，然后上面也显示连续尝试十次连接到一个指定站点都失败，别的不懂，权当帮你顶贴了

replies.author: 黑茶RGO
replies.txt_content:
惊现苦力怕 发表于 2017-1-7 23:05
java不适配当前版本吗。。要不就是出于某种原因崩溃了，或者是加载文件时出现bug ...
如何解决，java版本是没有问题的

replies.author: HDLONE
replies.txt_content:
我翻墙到谷歌去找了找，找到了一个类似问题的答案，对于这一行代码net.minecraft.bootstrap.FatalBootstrapError: Unable to un-lzma: LZMA.LzmaException: LZMA : Data Error翻译大概意思是，这意味着外部库，办理提取（减压）的LZMA格式时出错。至于哪一个错误，这是你的文件格式不正确。
想修复他呢，你可能要考虑重新安装整个Minecraft（删除你.Minecraft文件夹）然后我再给你个你尝试十次都下载失败的文件你放进去试试看= =不行再说，至于为什么我不放在这里是因为那玩意1.04MB，而我只能上传1000KB以内的。。。尴尬，给你个度盘网址你去下一下，，，http://pan.baidu.com/s/1hr73RO4

replies.author: YourFriendSM
replies.txt_content: 应该是正版启动器自动更新失败（被墙），所以无法启动游戏。（说错了表打我，好像可以用科学上网解决问题）

replies.author: 惊现苦力怕
replies.txt_content: 要么就是启动器加载错误崩了

replies.author: 黑茶RGO
replies.txt_content:
阴阳师元素祭祀 发表于 2017-1-8 08:56
很明显
是无法下载这个文件导致的
Unable to download remote file. Check your internet connection/pro ...
那些蓝色的链接全部要下载吗
你的启动器版本太老，启动器更新连不上官网，把老启动器卸了，去官网下载最新版就行了。
